column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Yes going on a train , this is was our ideal weekend activity not too long ago .
#id=2
#text=We purchased tickets to travel from Boston to New York City .
#id=3
#text=As we entered the platform of the train is was pure steel and looked so solidly strong .
#id=4
#text=We walked down the isle and found an comfortable looking seat and decided to sit there .
#id=5
#text=Shortly the train horn blasted making me jump of my seat lol .
#id=6
#text=Anyway we soon started moving and our train ride was underway .
#id=7
#text=The conductor walked the isles and collected our tickets .
#id=8
#text=love scenery so I had the window seat watching everything along the way .
#id=9
#text=First I saw large suburban areas but as we got into Connecticut many farms were being spotted .
#text=It was n't very hilly but sure was a country atmosphere .
#text=Soon we approached NYC and the train came to slow stop , we had arrived at our destination .
#text=The ride overall was rather smooth and it did n't seem to take all that long .
